content.detailedDescription:
Three of us, all adults, were talking out in the yard when a low passing plane caught our attention.  looking up we saw the plane pass and noticed a star light appearing object in the sky.  it looked like a star at night with approximately the same brightness as the north star at night, however this was in broad daylight so the intensity must have been substantially greater.  as we watched the light we saw it move an incrementally small distance and then stop.  it repeated this process at least forty times in the more than half an hour we watched it.  we finally lost it in the tree line.

i am estimating the altitude to be at a minimum of 60,000' and the course from north to south from wilkesboro, over boone, and then south.  sky was clear in the area of observation but around the area were whispy clouds in strange patterns and unusual shapes looking like disconnected random mares tails (alto stratus)as well as repetitive ripples.  i do not think the clouds we connected to the observation.

we did not take any pictures realizing that it was too far away to provide any detail.

i am a private pilot with 40 years experience and a local business man.
content.summary: Observed a star like object in daylight with strange movements.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on back patio facing the south looking at the sky. it was mostly a clear sky with some thin clouds in the far back ground. from the west,(my right i seen about 4 solid red lights fly east fairly quickly and form a diamond shape pattern and hover, then i seen a trail of a few 4-6 more come from the same direction and join the diamond shape almost changing it to a circular shape of red lights then one by one they left the circle and headed east individually and every one of them just disappeared not because they were out of my line of vision just vanished instantly.

i had my iphone and tried to take pictures they are very grainy only one picture shows 4 whitish circles as i seen forming the diamond shape. i went in house and got my 14 year old son to witness he did see the tale end of this strange event. he did see the last 4-6 head east and disappear.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red lights traveling from west to east forming a pattern ,then hovering then disappear

content.detailedDescription: Went out to jog at 11 pm and was heading north; turned to the west and was surprised to see two extremely bright orange fuzzy balls.  couldn't tell if they were moving at first, or if the moon was reflecting off aircraft.  stopped jogging to observe.  watched as the two lights remained in perfect formation blocking light from stars.  the stars between the two lights remained visible.  the speed of the lights was hard to determine; although they did not seem to be in a hurry.  started jogging again towards the west watching the two lights.  my peripheral picked up another light to my left from southeast.  my hair stood up all over.  three lights now, with the trailing light catching up to the first two.  looked back to the west and only saw one light; looked south and saw the third; looked back west and nothing; and when i turned south again the third light was gone.
content.summary: Three bright orange lights in triangular formation moving west.

content.detailedDescription: It was 11:59, june 9th, 2013. i was taking the dog out before i went to bed. from my deck you can see the big dipper really well. i always look at it when i go out. so as usual i was looking at it and slightly turned my head to the right and this air craft came toward the house from the nw with red and orange lights. as it came closer they seem to be pulsating, then i saw another coming, that is when i called for my husband and came out and watched them go by. the one thing he also said is that they stayed in the same air path, stayed the same color all the way around and there was not sound. they flew  straight towards my house and then then left (by their left) towards boston (east).
content.summary: Two ufo with red/orange lights, pulsating, comae from ne going to e, no sound, june 9th, 2013

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting out in backyard and i am always watching the sky. i was actually trying to get a look at the supermoon when all of a sudden the bright moving light appeared. i said what the hell is that? she looked and saw it to as the other 3 lights followed. thought it was a shooting star at first but no it wasn't. they appeared all 4 moving together somewhat a distance between them. we watched as they dissappeared over the tree line and continued to sit and watch for their return. tried to get a picture the only pic i caught looks like a huge orb. it was pretty cool though. wish i would of had my good camera out but only had my cell.I was so in shock of what i saw i was fumbling with my phone and then they were gone. they appeared slow moving.
content.summary: 4 bright fire looking balls

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my mom at her house in glenolden on june 19,2013.It was a crystal clear day and we were sitting outside when i looked up and noticed what looked like a star but moving very slowly.At first,i thought it was probably a bundle of mylar balloons.I always have my camera with me as there are deer and foxes in the area,so i ran in and got my camera went back out and started snapping away and couldn't believe what i saw.I took 5 photos and 1 short video clip using my nikon coolpix p500.I'm disappointed that i couldn't get a better video but it's very hard to keep object in view while zooming without a tripod.I don't really think this is anything alien,probably a satellite but i would really appreciate any info you could provide.The interesting thing you will notice is different profiles of object which suggests that it is turning.I don't know if a satellite would do that.I saw nothing above such as a large balloon,or any kind of propulsion. would i be able to take photos of a craft in orbit in broad daylight using 36x zoom ?   thanks for your time,  rick forte
content.summary: Bright star-like object very high in clear sky,took 5 photos of object that appears to be a satelite,i think !

content.detailedDescription: I had been outside in the evening taking pictures of the perigee moon at various times as it rose through the sky.  i had stopped, shut off the camera and was just relaxing in the backyard when i noticed a large yellow-orange light come over the house behind me.  i observed that it blinked very slowly, made no sound, was larger than a commercial airplane, lacked conventional aircraft lights and appeared to be one solid large light. since i have regularly observed various types of aircraft from this same vantage point, i realized that i was seeing something very unusual. i quickly turned the camera back on and managed to get 3 photos before the object disappeared behind tree cover where i could no longer see it. the camera used was a sony cyber-shot 16.1 megapixel. still shots were taken without use of the zoom feature. i had never correctly reset the date and time in the camera, so please be aware that the picture data is actually incorrect.  the sighting took place june 22, 2013.
content.summary: Large, silent yellow-orange oval slow-blinking light flew overhead

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room on the computer, when my mother came into my room and told me to look at the super moon. i went back into the house, and my neighbor came over, beating on the door saying "they're back!" my mother ran out and came back in and told me "come look! there are ufo's out there! come quick!"

i saw at least five lights in a line taking up most of the western horizon heading northeast dissapearing, one after another, as another appeared over the horizon in the west. 

ufos because of the color and there was no sound at all

there were at least 20 lights in the sky total, red orbs totally soundless, but my mother said she could hear a humming noise. traveled in a perfectly straight line, except for the last four, they were offset.

i felt intrigued, and told my mom to go get the video camera.
my mother felt happy that other people saw it.

i lost sight of the object when it dissapeared over our heads.
content.summary: More than 10 lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: This past friday, june 22 2013, i was in my driveway and clearly saw 4 small blue lights traveling from east to west over the tree line across the street from my house. we live at the beach and this object would have been coming from over the atlantic ocean. the lights seemed to be on the underside of one object. my wife and i have both flown our plane in the area and i am certain this was not a plane. it moved completely silently. i was tripping over my kids toys in the driveway trying to continue to see the object as it continued west over my house. it made no noise whatsoever. it continued on the same path and i estimate it to be flying from 1500- 4000 feet. however it was at night and distance was actually hard to determine.  i am interested in others who may have seen this object. it was clearly visible and i live in a well populated area near delray beach, fl.
content.summary: I witness four blue lights that appeared to be on the underside of a silent object that flew directly over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
i was not expecting to make another report so soon after a life altering sighting less than a week ago, yet here it is.
 as with the days ago sightings, i was on my porch smoking late at night, and sky-watching, which is something i've been doing a long time.
earlier in the day, knowing that a 'supermoon' was rising, i went out to observe it, and noted that 'chemtrails' were being laid in the night sky, which has been happening a lot lately.  it is also maddening for star watchers like myself. i keep having the thought- is there something in the night skies that someone does not want us to see? i am seeing a disproportionately high amount of odd phenomena on the very few clear viewing nights that have been available, and i don't exactly live outside and look constantly for these things. odds are, i am seeing maybe 1% of what is out there, and yet i am still seeing a lot. i feel dutiful to report these sightings.  for all i know, i or my partner and i, are the only ones in the whole city out there looking up in the middle of the night on a pretty regular basis. i hope we aren't the only ones. please forgive the narrative...Here's what i saw-

the earlier haze was still in the sky, but most stars were now visible.

 i was facing west and just when i looked straight up, my eye caught an object rapidly moving east. i watched as it went straight overhead, and then without changing speed, abruptly changed direction in a rounded turn to the south, a turn far too fast and tight for any plane or jet to make. it was impossible to determine altitude, except that it appeared higher than the highest jets fly, and perhaps as high as satellites are.
 it was visually about the size of mars, but very white.  after it turned south i watched it until it eventually faded into the background haze, with total eye contact of aprox. 24 to 26 seconds.
content.summary: Object travelling east turns south and fades into haze

content.detailedDescription: This is an account of one of the several ufo sightings i have had in my life, i was 14 yrs old, and this was not the first. i was camping with my mom and step dad at maple leaf park camp ground in earlville ill during july of 1976. on one of the mornings just after breakfast, i decided to go swimming at the pond. i don't know why, but when i reached the beach area i picked up a small twig and began to draw a design in the sand. it wasn't much, just a 1 inch circle with a six inch triangle around it, then three dots just outside the flat lines of the triangle. i did this for three mornings on my way to swim. i still to this day can't remember why i traced these in the sand. anyway, after i finished swimming on the third day i walked with a buddy of mine to the pool table house to shoot a few games of pool, and then we left. on our way back to the campsite some movement in the sky ahead caught my attention. as i watched i saw ten light gold colored discs flying in a triangle formation, moving between the cloud tops, right to left. i was walking east so i gathered that the objects where going north. all where identical and each had a darker orange band or stripe around the outer edge. they appeared to emit their own soft light and where a little fuzzy or blurred looking, sort of like a picture slightly out of focus. i watched for five to seven seconds and then i tapped my buddy on the arm, pointed to the sky and said "look at that!", but when he looked up they where already behind the clouds and gone. he said, "look at what". i stopped on the road and remember being a little upset that he didn't see what i did. i had a butterfly feeling in my stomach as the image of these things in my memory would just linger. they seemed to fly with a purpose. this is the third time i can remember seeing strange lights in the sky, i will write again to report the other times. thank you, robert l. brown.
content.summary: Formation of 10, luminous gold oval discs with perifferal orange band.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend chris and i were walking down the alley way between garden and mansion streets. we were about a hundred feet from my house. i was walking him to his house. we joked with each other as we walked, then chris said something that i didn't like, so i began chasing him. he hid under a box truck which was parked outside of the warehouse near by. it was night, so i wasn't going to follow him. who knows what kind of animals were crawling around under the truck.

i waited for a minute and looked skyward and sighed in anger.

when i looked, i saw what i call a "flying carousel" i saw a pattern of multi-colored lights. the light moved around the object like christmas chaser lights, only slower. 

i yelled for chris and said.

"chris, i'm not f%%king around, come out here and look at this."

chris emerged from under the truck and stood with me in the alley and we both watched the lights move northward until it was too far away we couldn't see it anymore. it didn't appear to have any structure only a circular pattern of lights.

note: i've seen a picture of something similar to this on various ufo television shows.
content.summary: Circular pattern of multi-colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend wes and i were talking our normal walk around town. when we reached the bristol wharf, along the delaware river, wes and i decided to take a break. we sat on a park bench overlooking the delaware river toward burlington island. at first, we saw nothing. then after a few minutes, we noticed an orange ball of light slowly fade on. the ball of light remained in place for between 20 and 30 seconds before slowly fading out and disappearing. then, it would slowly fade back on, but be above a different part of the island. we saw between 3 and four, but never at the same time.

wes and i watched this until we just got bored of it, and left.
content.summary: One, maybe multiple balls of light observed.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were standing outside talking when she made an exclamation, what the hell? i turned and saw 3 glowing lights moving very quickly at what seemed a close and fairly low altitude. there were 2 lights forward of the third that was in the middle. these three lights were followed by two more at about a 2 or 3 second interval.The other lights seemed to follow at different intervals and slightly different altitudes, some higher some a little lower.They were all tracking from the sw to the ne. we would see the lights appear in the sw emerging from behind the trees at the end of the block but much farther away like a small plane would.
they would then dissapear just slighty past what would be straight north.They were moving in the opposite direction of the way the clouds were moving in. in total we saw about 18 of them.They made no sound at all, my dad was a pilot and i was raised around planes of all sizes and commercial aircraft...These were not planes. no sound, no marker lights, no red or green strobes, also no chopper sounds like a helicopter. they seemed to pulsate an orange glow.
they would ascend slightly just before dissapearing. i did get some footage with my digital camera but it is fuzzy and shaky. i got one with a very close zoom and maybe seemed to have a conical form but not sure.
as far as my feelings and reactions...I do not think i have seen anything like this before and i watch the skies all the time, i think of my self as a star gazer...Always on the lookout for a shooting star or the occasional satellite. this was very odd to say the least.
content.summary: Saw about 18 glowing lights moving quickly from sw to ne and then dissapearing.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1995, i was 13. my late grandmother was taking my good friend bill and i to see batman forever in the theaters. as we waited for the septa bus at the corners of garden and beaver streets, in my home town of bristol, pennsylvania and noticed two asprin/disc shaped objects which i thought were huge mylar balloons at first. there were two of them. these objects wobbled as if a mylar balloon would, however they were horizontal. there were two of them and one was slightly higher and further back then the other.

i told my grandmom and bill to look and the three of us watched. the two objects moved over the row homes of garden street. once we reached the center of the street both objects hovered briefly, then began moving south toward philadelphia gaining altitude as they moved further away.

during the bus ride to the movies. bill and i searched the skies, hoping to see them again, but we did not.

when we got home later in the day, we told my late mother about what we saw and her reaction was. 

"if my mother wasn't with you, i'd say you guys were nuts."

this was only one of a few sightings, i've had.

will submit the others.


mike jordan.
content.summary: Waiting for bus when i noticed the two objects.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my apartment balcony about 9:30 to have a cigarette.I looked up because i heard a helicopter,then i heard two planes,then i saw two glowing balls of light floating across the sky from south to north,they slowed downdown,then went northeast. i went in and got my boyfriend. he saw them too. two people were walking and i said look.We went inside. after about 5 min i went back out to take our trash and saw another one. i got my guy. i knocked on neighbors door, they saw it too. we and them caught it on our camcorders. it was exciting. we wanted and waited to see more
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three redorange balls of light heading north across sky then hovered, then went ne.

content.detailedDescription: We went outside to look at the super moon, done looking there we turned around to walk inside and that's when my wife got my attention to look at this red dot flying across the sky right above the houses in the neighborhood north of me. at first my wife thinks its just a shooting star or perhaps a plane but it didn't have any of those characteristics. as she tells me to take out my camera it descends into the neighborhood and can't find any further evidence of it. we drive to a better vantage point and see a helicopter about 10 miles ne of us hovering as if monitoring the sky a red dot appears next to it i look away for a moment thinking it was just another helicopter i look back and the red dot is gone nowhere to be found. this was far too low flying to be anything that man would be flying plane or helicopter, made us totally intrigued to go looking for it. it seemed like it landed in the neighborhood and we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Red lights above neighborhood, descends into neighborhood and goes out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife went out to look at the bright moon and noticed a bright light in the sky traveling in a northern maybe a little northwest direction towards the big dipper. the light seem to be very high and a steady glow not like the airplanes we see on a normal bases. we seen what must have been 6 or maybe 7 different lights coming towards the big dipper from the south towards the handle of the dipper the glow from the objects got bright the it faded in to the dark sky. we got some video or the lights will try to post it as well
content.summary: Bright lights in sky getting very bright then getting very dim multi lights

content.detailedDescription: I was working in a parking lot directing traffic and i looked up to see a objecting that i thought was a plane because of its red and blue light. i went back to directing and after an unknown amount of time i looked up to see it again but i thought it was a star. then i realized the clouds in front of the moon. i looked at the object and saw it as a red light with a blue aura around it. i kept an eye on it for 10-20 minutes. i saw it move slowly to the left before stopping again. i then watched it slowly descend straight down behind a building. there was fireworks in the area which i think attracted it.
content.summary: Red light with blue aura around it. hovered and moved left slowly and stopped before descending behind building.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to look at stars...I thought it was a planet..Then i
saw it was moving fast like low flying airliner ,,no wings. 
no lights just a very brite light like it was blub...Look round at first then i could see some flat sides...It was 9:33 ,flew right over 
reno airport.. from nw to se..
content.summary: Sphere over airport

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two others were sitting outside and one person looked up and said "what is that?" we all got up and looked. one said is that a plane? no it kinda looks like a blimp on fire! it continued on a straight path going east and slowly got smaller as it got farther away. two other people came outside just as it disappeared into the dark eastern sky. we were really confused and excited and are still talking about what it could have possibly when.
content.summary: Ball of orange and white light flying horizontally east. was large when first sighted, then smaller when across the sky then fully disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was thundering, so my husband and i went outside to get our dogs. i seen a big glowing yellow ball flying through sky, thought a plane at first. but it was so big and wasnt blinking or making sound
. i kept watching as it flew so fast. i told my husband to look. he said what is that?
i said idk its not a star or airplane. got my dogs and was heading inside and i seen it above a house hovering
 pulsating in color. then was gone.
content.summary: Went really fast. then slowed down, then dissapeard.

content.detailedDescription:
I never believed in ufos/ets until i saw a ufo in portsmouth, nh on banfield road (the back road parallel to route one) in november 2003. it was a triangle shape with a white light at each point. i instantly thought it was probably a plane since pease international tradeport runway was like less than a mile away.

my girlfriend at the time and i were traveling south on banfield road and saw this white or orange or orange-white bright light through trees and finally it came over the road directly above us at tree height and as it was just about over us it instantly changed directions, doing 180 and heading back the way it came without even slowing down. 

we tried to chase it around the block (up to route 3 and back around) and still could see the bright light as i called my mom. then it was gone.

i later speculated if it could be a hovering harrier aircraft but it doesn't have that light configuration and again it didn't slow down at all when it did the 180 directly over us. we were so shaken up and freaked out. i wish i could see it again someday.

*[this sighting was a week or two after my girlfriend and i, in a hampton beach apartment, woke up naked in a fetal position on top of the covers with no memory of going to bed and my girlfriend found that her buttons were torn off her clothes (i would never ever rip her clothes no matter how drunk i was) and she had a mark on her breast of 3 dots that formed a triangle. i did not have any marks on my body nor were my clothes damaged.]
content.summary: Saw triangle craft with light at each point, at tree top height, do a 180 degree turn without slowing down 2 weeks after a possible abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was in berlin new hampshire walking out of the building i work in looking up at the moon and this big gold color 4 pointed star just below left of the moon about the position of venus. i was thinking that is a pretty star then it just faded out all the while i am hearing stationary jet engine like noise which caught my attention because we have very little air traffic here but the noise sounded like a jet engine as if it was being tested on a stand. i put my stuff in the vehicle and was reaching for my camera when there was 4 maybe five but i think 4 large circular lights just appeared one was a gold light the others were white and then i am not sure if one changed colors or if it was a new light but it was reddish orange in color the lights were just like some one switched them on and off they were there then the were not. two were separate and spaced a part the other two side by side staggered from the two that were spaced out. they came on and went out all in about 3 or 4 seconds then the jet engine noise stopped.  as i leave the area the headed north to the town of milan i noticed a gold light moving at a high rate of speed headed in the same direction that i seen the other lights. 
i only wish i could have caught the lights on camera but i did not. i did however think it was awesome that i got to witness this event.
content.summary: Bright gold color star below left of moon then faded away then 4 lights flashed on circular in shape white gold reddish orange then nothing but jetlike noises

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was about 3 am (i cant remember the exact time but it was a little after 3)and i was in the kitchen getting a glass of water. i was at the sink looking out the window when all of a sudden i saw this really bright light shoot up into the sky. for a second i almost thought someone was shooting up fireworks and i expected it to explode but it just disappeared into the sky. i know that it definitely not a comet, i've seen comets before and this light definitely appeared to have taken off from earth into the sky, plus the light was way too bright to have been a comet. also as it descended into the  sky it flashed for a second, its hard to describe like it slightly lost its light then it got really bright and then disappeared into the sky. i was very shocked by it and i ran into the other room where my sister was and told her about it. she told me that it was probably a comet or something but i know that it wasn't one.
content.summary: Ufo appeared to have ascended into the sky very quickly (it did not appear to be a comet at all)

content.detailedDescription: At 9:34pm on june 20th 2013, (2)orange pulsating orbs/saucer object appeared over the horizon and tree line looking south. the objects were approx. 40 feet apart with one following the other. once above, the following object turned and went to the west and was lost behind a tree line. lead object was trailed for approx another minute heading from strait above to north of my location. it then flickered twice and faded out and disappeared. i continue my investigation into this phenomena and have yet to pinpoint exactly what it was.
content.summary: Orange pulsating orbs coming from south west to the north. once above, one orb went west, the other continued north for about a minute and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my chair eating a ham n cheese pocket something caught my eye a cone shape object spinning real fast the color was mesmurizing, went right by window i yelled ro my daughter we ran outside. ther was many of these objects shotting all over the place i ran to the side of the house and a bomerange ship object raised up over my house, turned slowly, no noise , very quiet , so close i could see the color and shapes on it, a grey it swirled and mixed like it was alive. over the baseball field ther was a long cylinder shaped, with flashing colors like greens and red but not our green and reds in front of it wher other cone shaped ships and more behind it, these moved quick, but the larger just coasted floated along. these cone ahape ones wher like playing with each other. then above suddenly we saw 3 lights in a triangle shaped , light on each corner it moved up and down real slow and just turned (spun) around real slow it was huge you could see detail then it flew straight up as it turned and all the cone shaped ships disappear into it well it looked like that this event made my life hell when we spoke about it, so i stopped, ther was so much of them it was like they wher looking for the craft that shot down by my window they even shot down the street like they wher searching. i was so scared i literally pooped my pants, but i couldnt move our video camera died, so we had no footage, but it was an event in my life id never forget, but let me tell you this it was like an army scary if they wanted to and if they had weapons on those ships we are screwed. i'll never,never forget i talked to a neighbor , he has been in this neighborhood for years he said that around 5 years prior he saw the same things scary we have moved since and never saw anything like that again, but every time i go out at night and its a clear sky sometimes u see in a distance the grey, small objects moving about i know what they are. i was not a believer untill that night in july.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I watched ufo over earth, to see comparisions ther are, stop asking why you didnt take a picture, after i literally pooped my pants when i faced the bomerange object then i froze, the color was mixed grey it moved about like it was alive it blended, mixed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a training mission at camp shelby training facility my scout unit was scatter along the tree lines surrounding a 250 to 300 yard field  i was on watch on top of my hmmv it was about 11 or 12 at night . to pass time i 
was watching flares go up then illuminate as the floated down over a tank firing then listen to the tanks firing then a flare ascended but it was farther left of the others and when it illuminated and float down it remained stationary look like a star i waited then a looked through the nightvision scope mounted on the m60 i was manning i saw and object with 4 to 5 circular white lights or windows but they gave off no light just dull white i then look with 
my naked i see the star through the scope an object then i hoped down into my vehicle and woke the medic that was attached to my squad and pointed out the star and asked him to look through the scope and tell me what he saw he did then look at me then looked again confirming the same he saw what i saw after about 15 to 20 mins it started slowly moving to my right along the tree tops the star behind it were blocked showing the the outline of the object and the tops of the trees passed in front of the windows then it moved toward my position stopping directly overhead then we could see that the object was triangle shaped with a circle in the center all black then it started slowly ascending and spinning then it rapidly ascended out of view
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed what i thought was a flare ascending after observing other flares over a firing range when the flare never descended i look through my nightvision scope mounted on my hmmm the object was cigar shaped with 4to 5 windows that seemed to be back lit.

content.detailedDescription: Went home for vacation and aunt asked me and my friend if we had seen ufo's told her no so when it got dark she took us outside and she pointed them out to us. there were 2 to 3 of them and they were hovering in the sky 1 would above the dam or plant while the other 1 or 2 would hover across the sky, they also would go up and down for a short distance then in a blink of an eye they would switch places. we observed this the entire mth we were there. there was also write ups in the local paper ( the daily interlake) about peoples cars staling and watches stopping when they were closer to the objects. these objects were doing things that no plane or helicopter could do. i think the 3 colors that would blink were white, blue and sometimes red. mostly they were just white lights in the sky. i knew these were not planes and knowing they were going to be there once it got dark was surreal because i knew they were ufo's not something we could explain. they were still there when we went back to ca. when our vacation was up. when ever i told anyone about it i was laughed at. people to this day still ask me hey seen any ufo's lately.+
content.summary: 2-3 hovering nightly fot over a mth. 1 would hover over the dam or aluiminun plant while 1or 2 were above mountain area, then woulsdswitch places.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a training mission at camp shelby training facility my scout unit was scatter along the tree lines surrounding a 250 to 300 yard field  i was on watch on top of my hmmv it was about 11 or 12 at night . to pass time i 
was watching flares go up then illuminate as the floated down over a tank firing then listen to the tanks firing then a flare ascended but it was farther left of the others and when it illuminated and float down it remained stationary look like a star i waited then a looked through the nightvision scope mounted on the m60 i was manning i saw and object with 4 to 5 circular white lights or windows but they gave off no light just dull white i then look with 
my naked i see the star through the scope an object then i hoped down into my vehicle and woke the medic that was attached to my squad and pointed out the star and asked him to look through the scope and tell me what he saw he did then look at me then looked again confirming the same he saw what i saw after about 15 to 20 mins it started slowly moving to my right along the tree tops the star behind it were blocked showing the the outline of the object and the tops of the trees passed in front of the windows then it moved toward my position stopping directly overhead then we could see that the object was triangle shaped with a circle in the center all black then it started slowly ascending and spinning then it rapidly ascended out of view
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed what i thought was a flare ascending after observing other flares over a firing range when the flare never descended i look through my nightvision scope mounted on my hmmm the object was cigar shaped with 4to 5 windows that seemed to be back lit.
